title: NFDI4Earth Incubator: PhenoMapping - A participatory visual tool for curation and verification of historical phenological data
summary: PI, 2025–2026, funded by NFDI4Earth Incubator, collaborating with the archives of the Bavarian State (GDA).

title: DAAD PPP: A real-world data-driven simulator for interaction-aware autonomous driving benchmarking.
summary: PI, 2024–2025, funded by DAAD PPP with the University of Glasgow.

title: NFDI4Earth Incubator: Prompt-accessed GeoQAmap for Earth Data
summary: PI, 2023–2024, funded by NFDI4Earth Incubator. A multi-agent spatial data analysis framework for natural-language interaction with vector geospatial data across relational and graph databases; supports vector-store fuzzy searches and step-by-step exploratory analysis with rich visualization. [article]

title: ISPRS SI: BeBaOI - Benchmark and Baseline Methods for determining Overlapping Images
summary: PI, 2023–2024, funded by ISPRS Scientific Initiatives; collaborated with Dr.-Ing. Xin Wang, School of Geodesy and Geomatics, Wuhan University. [report]

title: TUM GIF: Knowledge discovery and visual analysis for urban mobility data in Munich and Helsinki
summary: co-PI, 2023–2024, funded by TUM Global Incentive Fund; collaborated with Dr. Henrikki Tenkanen, Department of Built Environment, Aalto University.

title: NFDI4Earth EduPilots: Coding4Geo - An interactive coding platform for e-learning in Geospatial Data Analysis
summary: PI, 2022–2023, funded by NFDI4Earth Educational Pilots. Coding4Geo provides an online interactive coding platform that auto-checks student submissions for geoinformatics courses at TUM, with a long-term goal to extend and deploy for broader ESS-related disciplines.
